name: Spell Slingers: Trick or Treat Demo
name_original: Spell Slingers: Trick or Treat Demo
description:
Find the Pumpkin King and TAKE HIS HEAD!  FEATURES:
  • Open World Exploration!
  • Variety of Challenging AI Enemies!
  • 11 unique Spells to Master!
  • Over 40 unique Armor, Wands, Items, and Accessories to Loot!
  • Gamepad/Controller Support (except menus)!

See READ ME file for gamepad controls and keyboard + mouse bindings!

Gamepad Controls recommended. 

WARNING: There is no save game and death is final! PRESS 0 TO RESTART GAME!

Designed and Developed by Grant Andrew Ervin
All original content property of Honeycomb Interactive
